data.name: Are_you_ready_to_tell_me_what_happened_that_night
data.value: Are you ready to tell me what happened that night?

data.name: I_I_dont_know
data.value: I... I don't know.

data.name: Im_only_here_to_help_you_Ryan_You_know_that_That_has_always_been_my_goal_with_you_
data.value: I'm only here to help you, Ryan. You know that. That has always been my goal with you.

data.name: I_guess_thats_true
data.value: I guess that's true.

data.name: It_is_So_why_dont_you_start_with_what_you_saw_when_you_came_home
data.value: It is. So, why don't you start with what you saw when you came home?

data.name: I_saw_her_Cynthia_cowering_on_the_floor_of_the_kitchen
data.value: I saw her, Cynthia, cowering on the floor of the kitchen.

data.name: Her_lip_was_bleeding_and_one_of_her_eyes_was_turning_black_on_the_spot
data.value: Her lip was bleeding, and one of her eyes was turning black on the spot.

data.name: I_ran_straight_to_her_and_asked_her_what_happened_I_thought_wed_had_a_break_in
data.value: I ran straight to her and asked her what happened. I thought we'd had a break in.

data.name: And_what_did_she_say_to_you
data.value: And what did she say to you?

data.name: At_first_she_wasnt_making_any_sense_She_kept_saying_things_like_Im_alright_Im_alright_it_wasnt_his_fault_and_I_was_asking_her_who_is_he
data.value: At first she wasn't making any sense. She kept saying things like "I'm alright, I'm alright, it wasn't his fault," and I was asking her "who is he?".

data.name: Then_I_thought_maybe_she_was_cheating_on_me_again_That_shed_brought_somebody_home_and_theyd_attacked_her
data.value: Then I thought maybe she was cheating on me again. That she'd brought somebody home and they'd attacked her.

data.name: But_thats_not_what_happened
data.value: But that's not what happened.

data.name: No_No_its_not_I_asked_her_who_who_did_this__and_she_kept_crying_and_telling_me_to_keep_my_voice_down_and_thats
data.value: No. No it's not. I asked her, "who? who did this ?" and she kept crying and telling me to keep my voice down, and that's...

data.name: Thats_when_you_realized_he_was_in_the_house_with_you
data.value: That's when you realized he was in the house with you.

data.name: Yes_I_heard_him_blasting_music_from_his_room_Hed_just_left_her_to_bleed_on_the_floor
data.value: Yes. I heard him blasting music from his room. He'd just left her to bleed on the floor.

data.name: So_what_did_you_do_next
data.value: So what did you do next?

data.name: I_helped_Cynthia_into_a_chair_and_got_her_some_ice_and_then_I_told_her_Id_be_right_back_She_was_scared_out_of_her_mind_I_think
data.value: I helped Cynthia into a chair and got her some ice, and then I told her I'd be right back. She was scared out of her mind, I think.

data.name: She_didnt_want_me_to_go_up_there_She_said_he_had_some_kind_of_a_weapon
data.value: She didn't want me to go up there. She said he had some kind of a weapon.

data.name: That_hed_threatened_to_kill_us_both_with_it_if_we_bothered_him_I_told_her_I_was_just_going_to_get_some_painkillers_from_our_bedroom
data.value: That he'd threatened to kill us both with it if we bothered him. I told her I was just going to get some painkillers from our bedroom.

data.name: I_dont_know_if_she_believed_me_Then_I_went_upstairs_His_door_was_slightly_open
data.value: I don't know if she believed me. Then I went upstairs. His door was slightly open.

data.name: I_could_see_him_in_his_room_before_he_could_see_me
data.value: I could see him in his room, before he could see me.

data.name: And_what_was_he_doing
data.value: And what was he doing?

data.name: Just_sitting_On_the_edge_of_his_bed_Perfectly_still_Just_staring_at_the_wall
data.value: Just... sitting. On the edge of his bed. Perfectly still. Just staring at the wall.

data.name: Youd_never_have_known_what_hed_just_done_To_his_own_mother
data.value: You'd never have known what he'd just done. To his own mother.

data.name: There_was_something_in_his_lap_but_I_couldnt_quite_see_it_I_figured_that_was_his_weapon
data.value: There was something in his lap, but I couldn't quite see it. I figured that was his weapon.

data.name: I_had_to_do_something_right_then_and_there_He_was_putting_us_all_in_danger
data.value: I had to do something, right then and there. He was putting us all in danger.

data.name: Did_you_call_the_police
data.value: Did you call the police?

data.name: I_would_have_had_to_leave_the_house_to_do_it_and_I_didnt_want_to_leave_Cynthia_alone_I_didnt_know_what_he_was_going_to_do_next
data.value: I would have had to leave the house to do it, and I didn't want to leave Cynthia alone. I didn't know what he was going to do next.

data.name: So_what_did_you_do
data.value: So what did you do?

data.name: I_jumped_him_from_behind
data.value: I jumped him from behind.

data.name: I_tried_to_talk_him_down_so_that_we_could_get_him_help_
data.value: I tried to talk him down so that we could get him help.

data.name: I_went_back_to_my_room_and_started_packing_for_Cynthia_and_me_to_get_away_
data.value: I went back to my room and started packing for Cynthia and me to get away.

data.name: I_didnt_really_have_a_choice_I_just_knew_I_needed_to_stop_him
data.value: I didn't really have a choice. I just knew I needed to stop him.

data.name: So_you_attacked_him
data.value: So you attacked him?

data.name: You_have_to_understand_me_I_didnt_want_to_hurt_him_I_just_needed_him_to_drop_whatever_he_had
data.value: You have to understand me, I didn't want to hurt him! I just needed him to drop whatever he had.

data.name: I_thought_maybe_once_he_saw_that_he_wasnt_going_to_be_able_to_hurt_us_hed_sit_down_and_listen_to_reason
data.value: I thought maybe once he saw that he wasn't going to be able to hurt us, he'd sit down and listen to reason.

data.name: Then_we_could_put_him_in_a_hospital_or_something_for_a_while_I_didnt_think_I_never_thought_that
data.value: Then we could put him in a hospital or something for a while. I didn't think, I never thought that...

data.name: Tell_me_how_you_did_it
data.value: Tell me how you did it.

data.name: Dont_make_it_sound_like_I_knew_what_I_was_doing_I_didnt_I_really_didnt
data.value: Don't make it sound like I knew what I was doing. I didn't, I really didn't.

data.name: I_just_got_so_so_angry_all_of_a_sudden_I_came_up_behind_him_and_I_hit_him_hard_across_the_back_of_the_head
data.value: I just got so... so angry, all of a sudden. I came up behind him and I hit him, hard across the back of the head.

data.name: It_surprised_him_He_fell_forward_and_I_used_the_opportunity_to_grab_what_he_had_in_his_lap
data.value: It surprised him. He fell forward, and I used the opportunity to grab what he had in his lap.

data.name: It_was_just_a_wrench_It_wasnt_even_that_heavy
data.value: It was just a wrench. It wasn't even that heavy.

data.name: What_happened_after_he_fell
data.value: What happened after he fell?

data.name: I_tried_to_hold_his_head_down_to_the_ground_but_he_was_stronger_than_I_thought
data.value: I tried to hold his head down to the ground, but he was stronger than I thought.

data.name: He_got_right_back_up_and_turned_around_and_I_realized_in_that_moment_that_whoever_I_was_looking_at_wasnt_my_son
data.value: He got right back up and turned around, and I realized in that moment that whoever I was looking at wasn't my son.

data.name: Not_really_It_was_like_a_monster_had_taken_over
data.value: Not really. It was like a monster had taken over.

data.name: There_wasnt_a_trace_of_humanity_left_in_him
data.value: There wasn't a trace of humanity left in him.

data.name: Did_he_hurt_you_too
data.value: Did he hurt you too?

data.name: Yes
data.value: Yes.

data.name: It_only_took_him_a_second_to_realize_what_had_happened_and_who_had_hit_him_and_then_he_was_right_back_up_and_punching_me_as_hard_as_he_could_in_the_face_without_a_word
data.value: It only took him a second to realize what had happened, and who had hit him, and then he was right back up and punching me as hard as he could in the face without a word.

data.name: He_knocked_the_air_straight_out_of_me_Put_me_flat_on_my_back
data.value: He knocked the air straight out of me. Put me flat on my back.

data.name: And_did_he_say_anything_to_you_after_that
data.value: And did he say anything to you after that?

data.name: He_told_me_I_really_ought_to_mind_my_own_business
data.value: He told me I really ought to mind my own business.

data.name: I_was_enraged
data.value: I was enraged.

data.name: I_yelled_at_him_to_stop_but_he_didnt_he_just_kept_hitting_me_hitting_me_so_hard_I_could_barely_see_and_my_nose_was_bleeding_and_I_called_out_for_Cynthia_but_I_dont_think_she_could_hear_us
data.value: I yelled at him to stop, but he didn't, he just kept hitting me, hitting me so hard I could barely see, and my nose was bleeding, and I called out for Cynthia but I don't think she could hear us.

data.name: And_then
data.value: And then?

data.name: And_then_It_was_like_my_body_acted_on_its_own_I_didnt_even_think_about_it
data.value: And then... It was like my body acted on its own. I didn't even think about it.

data.name: I_think_it_was_self_defense_and_I_know_I_was_crying_and_I_just_swung_the_damn_wrench_up_to_where_I_thought_his_face_might_be_above_mine_and_and
data.value: I think it was self defense, and I know I was crying, and I just swung the damn wrench up to where I thought his face might be above mine and... and...

data.name: Oh_god_the_sound_was_awful
data.value: Oh god, the sound was awful.

data.name: And_then_he_fell
data.value: And then he fell.

data.name: Yes_but_not_right_away_It_took_him_a_second_Like_he_was_thinking_about_it
data.value: Yes, but not right away. It took him a second. Like he was thinking about it.

data.name: He_got_all_quiet_and_I_looked_him_in_the_eyes_and_he_just_looked_surprised
data.value: He got all quiet, and I looked him in the eyes and he just looked surprised.

data.name: Not_even_sad_or_upset_Just_surprised
data.value: Not even sad, or upset. Just surprised.

data.name: And_then_he_fell_on_top_of_me_like_a_rag_doll_and_I_just_knew
data.value: And then he fell on top of me, like a rag doll, and I just knew.

data.name: I_knew_he_was_gone
data.value: I knew he was gone.

data.name: But_if_you_killed_him_then_how_did_you
data.value: But if you killed him, then how did you...?

data.name: It_was_Cynthia
data.value: It was Cynthia.

data.name: I_was_trying_to_get_up_and_I_turned_around_and_she_was_there_holding_one_of_the_heavy_ceramic_vases_her_mother_gave_to_us
data.value: I was trying to get up and I turned around, and she was there, holding one of the heavy ceramic vases her mother gave to us.

data.name: I_thought_she_was_going_to_faint
data.value: I thought she was going to faint.

data.name: I_got_up_to_help_her_to_run_over_to_her_but_then_she_lifted_the_vase_up_above_her_head
data.value: I got up to help her, to run over to her, but then... she lifted the vase up above her head.

data.name: And_thats_the_last_thing_I_remember
data.value: And that's the last thing I remember.

data.name: Thats_all_you_remember_It_was_Cynthia
data.value: That's all you remember? It was Cynthia?

data.name: I_didnt_believe_it_myself_I_couldnt_have
data.value: I didn't believe it myself. I couldn't have.

data.name: It_took_me_ages_of_searching_around_in_that_basement_to_remember_even_that_far
data.value: It took me ages of searching around in that basement to remember even that far.

data.name: When_I_woke_up_in_that_basement_I_thought_I_thought_maybe_somebody_had_come_in_or_I_had_fallen_down
data.value: When I woke up in that basement, I thought.... I thought maybe somebody had come in, or I had fallen down.

data.name: I_thought_my_family_was_in_danger
data.value: I thought my family was in danger.

data.name: But_I_was_wrong
data.value: But I was wrong.

data.name: It_was_them
data.value: It was them.

data.name: They_hurt_me
data.value: They hurt me.

data.name: My_own_family
data.value: My own family.

data.name: My_own_wife_imprisoned_me
data.value: My own wife imprisoned me.

data.name: She_left_me_to_die
data.value: She left me to die.

data.name: You_killed_her_only_son_Ryan_She_was_terrified
data.value: You killed her only son, Ryan. She was terrified.

data.name: Yeah_well_well_see_what_the_jury_thinks_about_that
data.value: Yeah, well, we'll see what the jury thinks about that.

data.name: I_was_only_trying_to_protect_her_I_was_trying_to_protect_us
data.value: I was only trying to protect her. I was trying to protect us.

data.name: From_the_son_you_raised
data.value: From the son you raised.

data.name: Yeah_I_mean_I_guess_thats_the_truly_scary_part_about_all_this_isnt_it
data.value: Yeah, I mean, I guess that's the truly scary part about all this, isn't it?

data.name: He_was_our_son_He_slept_in_our_house_We_took_care_of_him_when_he_was_sick
data.value: He was our son. He slept in our house. We took care of him when he was sick.

data.name: We_gave_up_our_lives_for_him_I_switched_jobs
data.value: We gave up our lives for him. I switched jobs.

data.name: His_mother_tucked_him_in_at_night_for_years
data.value: His mother tucked him in at night for years.

data.name: Psychopathy_is_very_difficult_to_understand
data.value: Psychopathy is... very difficult to understand.

data.name: I_dont_think_I_want_to_understand_I_dont_want_to_know_what_was_happening_in_his_head
data.value: I don't think I want to understand. I don't want to know what was happening in his head.

data.name: I_dont_want_to_know_what_he_was_thinking_when_he_hit_herOr_when_he_attacked_me
data.value: I don't want to know what he was thinking when he hit her. Or when he attacked me.

data.name: Or_when_I_when_we_looked_at_each_other
data.value: Or when I... when we looked at each other...

data.name: Perhaps_we_should_end_here_We_can_always_pick_up_later
data.value: Perhaps we should end here? We can always pick up later.

data.name: I_just_need_a_moment
data.value: I just need a moment.

data.name: I_couldnt_just_abandon_him_Hes_my_son
data.value: I couldn't just abandon him. He's my son.

data.name: I_thought_maybe_if_I_could_just_talk_to_him_father_to_son_he_would_listen
data.value: I thought maybe if I could just talk to him, father to son, he would listen.

data.name: Then_we_could_get_him_the_help_he_needed
data.value: Then we could get him the help he needed.

data.name: And_how_did_that_go
data.value: And how did that go?

data.name: Not_how_it_should_have
data.value: Not how it should have.

data.name: I_knew_we_hadnt_been_talking_much_lately_but_I_really_thought_he_would_care_about_what_his_own_father_had_to_say
data.value: I knew we hadn't been talking much lately, but I really thought he would care about what his own father had to say.

data.name: I_knocked_on_the_doorframe_so_that_I_wouldnt_surprise_him_and_the_way_he_looked_around_at_me_I_almost_felt_scared
data.value: I knocked on the doorframe so that I wouldn't surprise him, and the way he looked around at me, I almost felt... scared.

data.name: He_didnt_look_like_he_regretted_anything_at_all_He_just_looked_empty
data.value: He didn't look like he regretted anything at all. He just looked empty.

data.name: Empty_and_maybe_a_little_annoyed_that_I_was_there
data.value: Empty and maybe a little annoyed that I was there.

data.name: It_was_like_all_of_a_sudden_I_realized_that_this_person_Id_been_looking_at_all_his_life_wasnt_who_I_thought_he_was
data.value: It was like all of a sudden I realized that this person I'd been looking at all his life wasn't who I thought he was.

data.name: But_who_was_he
data.value: But who was he?

data.name: I_dont_know_I_just_dont_know_Somebody_soulless
data.value: ...I don't know. I just don't know. Somebody soulless.

data.name: He_asked_me_what_I_was_doing_I_told_him_I_just_wanted_to_talk
data.value: He asked me what I was doing. I told him I just wanted to talk.

data.name: He_didnt_move_or_say_anything_so_I_just_went_ahead_and_sat_down_next_to_him_on_the_bed
data.value: He didn't move or say anything, so I just went ahead and sat down next to him on the bed.

data.name: I_swear_I_could_feel_the_irritated_energy_coming_off_of_him_when_I_did_It_was_cold
data.value: I swear I could feel the irritated energy coming off of him when I did. It was... cold.

data.name: I_asked_him_what_happened_I_asked_him_if_he_knew_what_state_his_mother_was_in_downstairs
data.value: I asked him what happened. I asked him if he knew what state his mother was in downstairs.

data.name: Did_he_admit_to_hurting_her
data.value: Did he admit to hurting her?

data.name: No_not_really_But_he_didnt_deny_it_either
data.value: No, not really. But he didn't deny it either.

data.name: He_just_said_he_was_sure_shed_be_alright_Honestly_it_broke_my_heart
data.value: He just said he was sure she'd be alright. Honestly, it broke my heart.

data.name: To_see_my_son_do_that_to_his_own_mother_and_feel_nothing_It_was_painful
data.value: To see my son do that to his own mother, and feel nothing... It was painful.

data.name: I_couldnt_help_it_I_started_cryingI_couldnt_understand_what_was_happening_I_just_wanted_it_to_be_a_nightmare
data.value: I couldn't help it. I started crying. I couldn't understand what was happening. I just wanted it to be a nightmare.

data.name: I_wanted_to_wake_up_I_wanted_Landon_to_snap_out_of_it
data.value: I wanted to wake up. I wanted Landon to snap out of it.

data.name: I_told_him_you_cant_really_mean_that_and_the_look_on_his_face_when_he_heard_my_voice_breaking
data.value: I told him "you can't really mean that", and the look on his face when he heard my voice breaking...

data.name: I_knew_immediately_that_I_wasnt_safe
data.value: I knew immediately that I wasn't safe.

data.name: He_pulled_the_wrench_out_from_under_his_leg_before_I_could_do_anything
data.value: He pulled the wrench out from under his leg before I could do anything.

data.name: A_wrench
data.value: A wrench?

data.name: The_weapon_Cynthia_had_mentioned
data.value: The weapon Cynthia had mentioned.

data.name: The_last_thing_I_remember_was_him_raising_it_over_his_head_and_it_swinging_towards_me
data.value: The last thing I remember was him raising it over his head, and it swinging towards me.

data.name: The_next_thing_I_knew_I_woke_up_in_the_basement
data.value: The next thing I knew I woke up in the basement.

data.name: And_thats_all_you_remember_It_was_Landon_all_along
data.value: And that's all you remember? It was Landon all along?

data.name: I_didnt_want_to_believe_it
data.value: I didn't want to believe it.

data.name: It_took_me_ages_of_wandering_around_in_that_basement_to_remember_it_for_myself_completely
data.value: It took me ages of wandering around in that basement to remember it for myself completely.

data.name: All_that_time_I_thought_my_family_was_in_danger
data.value: All that time, I thought my family was in danger.

data.name: I_thought_maybe_theyd_been_taken_away_and_thats_why_they_werent_helping_me
data.value: I thought maybe they'd been taken away, and that's why they weren't helping me.

data.name: And_all_that_time_Id_just_been_abandoned
data.value: And all that time I'd just been abandoned.

data.name: Cynthia_too
data.value: Cynthia, too?

data.name: She_must_have_left_with_him_after_he_threw_me_in_the_basement
data.value: She must have left with him after he threw me in the basement.

data.name: Shes_always_been_so_attached_to_him_Hes_her_little_boy_She_obsesses_over_him
data.value: She's always been so attached to him. He's her little boy. She obsesses over him.

data.name: She_was_willing_to_move_for_him_She_didnt_care_how_it_made_me_feel_
data.value: She was willing to move for him. She didn't care how it made me feel.

data.name: Wed_been_growing_apart_and_then_to_have_her_baby_do_something_like_that_Running_off_with_him_only_made_sense_to_her
data.value: We'd been growing apart, and then to have her baby do something like that... Running off with him only made sense to her.

data.name: She_probably_wanted_to_protect_him
data.value: She probably wanted to protect him.

data.name: Ugh_I
data.value: Ugh... I...

data.name: Are_you_alright_Ryan
data.value: Are you alright, Ryan?

data.name: Its_just_sickening
data.value: It's just sickening.

data.name: How_about_we_take_a_short_break_You_can_catch_your_breath
data.value: How about we take a short break. You can catch your breath.

data.name: It_didnt_feel_like_I_had_a_choice_I_didnt_want_anybody_to_get_hurt_any_more
data.value: It didn't feel like I had a choice. I didn't want anybody to get hurt any more.

data.name: Especially_not_my_family_I_thought_we_could_just_pack_up_and_escape
data.value: Especially not my family. I thought we could just pack up and escape.

data.name: Maybe_go_stay_in_a_hotel_for_the_night
data.value: Maybe go stay in a hotel for the night.

data.name: I_thought_once_we_were_safely_out_of_there_we_could_call_the_police_to_confront_Landon
data.value: I thought once we were safely out of there, we could call the police to confront Landon.

data.name: You_didnt_think_you_should_confront_him_yourself
data.value: You didn't think you should confront him yourself?

data.name: No_we_were_past_that_He_was_violent_I_felt_like_I_hardly_even_knew_him_anymore
data.value: No, we were past that. He was violent. I felt like I hardly even knew him anymore.

data.name: Son_or_not_hed_become_a_stranger_I_didnt_know_what_I_could_have_said_or_done
data.value: Son or not, he'd become a stranger. I didn't know what I could have said or done.

data.name: I_just_kept_thinking_about_Cynthia_too_and_the_way_shed_looked_so_pathetic_and_hurt
data.value: I just kept thinking about Cynthia too, and the way she'd looked so pathetic and hurt.

data.name: The_way_she_kept_making_excuses_for_him_I_knew_the_only_way_to_save_her_would_be_to_get_her_far_away_from_him
data.value: The way she kept making excuses for him... I knew the only way to save her would be to get her far away from him.

data.name: So_I_went_back_to_our_room_and_started_packing_for_both_of_us
data.value: So I went back to our room and started packing for both of us.

data.name: You_didnt_consult_her_first
data.value: You didn't consult her first?

data.name: She_never_would_have_agreed_I_knew_she_wouldnt_have_agreed
data.value: She never would have agreed. I knew she wouldn't have agreed.

data.name: So_I_just_brought_the_bag_to_her_downstairs_and_told_her_we_were_leaving_She_was_so_beaten
data.value: So I just brought the bag to her downstairs and told her we were leaving. She was so beaten.

data.name: I_thought_she_would_leave_with_me_right_away_That_she_would_finally_see_sense
data.value: I thought she would leave with me right away. That she would finally see sense.

data.name: But_she_was_absolutely_brokenI_found_her_still_sitting_on_the_floor_trying_to_act_like_nothing_was_wrong
data.value: But she was absolutely broken. I found her still sitting on the floor, trying to act like nothing was wrong.

data.name: I_grabbed_her_arm_and_told_her_come_on_were_leaving_but_she_just_kept_shaking_her_head
data.value: I grabbed her arm and told her "come on, we're leaving", but she just kept shaking her head.

data.name: So_you_tried_to_force_her
data.value: So you tried to force her?

data.name: I_didnt_know_what_else_I_could_do
data.value: I didn't know what else I could do!

data.name: She_wasnt_listening_to_common_sense
data.value: She wasn't listening to common sense.

data.name: There_was_no_telling_how_much_time_we_had_before_Landon_realized_something_was_happening
data.value: There was no telling how much time we had before Landon realized something was happening.

data.name: I_ended_up_trying_to_drag_her_out_with_me_but_she_wouldnt_cooperate_She_started_screaming_and_yelling_telling_me_she_couldnt_leave_her_baby
data.value: I ended up trying to drag her out with me, but she wouldn't cooperate. She started screaming and yelling, telling me she couldn't leave her baby.

data.name: I_tried_to_tell_her_that_didnt_make_any_sense_but_she_just_wouldnt_listen_She_was_sobbing
data.value: I tried to tell her that didn't make any sense, but she just wouldn't listen. She was sobbing.

data.name: Inconsolable_I_was_trying_to_get_her_to_stop_telling_her_she_needed_to_leave_that_Landon_would_hear_her_but
data.value: Inconsolable. I was trying to get her to stop, telling her she needed to leave, that Landon would hear her... but...

data.name: But_she_wouldnt
data.value: But she wouldn't.

data.name: And_Landon_must_have_heard
data.value: And Landon must have heard.

data.name: Next_thing_I_knew_Cynthia_was_looking_up_at_him_and_he_was_standing_behind_me_watching_us_both
data.value: Next thing I knew, Cynthia was looking up at him, and he was standing behind me, watching us both.

data.name: He_was_holding_a_wrench_He_didnt_even_look_at_me_He_just_told_Cynthia_to_come_to_him
data.value: He was holding a wrench. He didn't even look at me. He just told Cynthia to come to him.

data.name: And_she_she_did_She_shook_herself_out_of_my_grip_and_went_to_him_after_only_about_a_minute
data.value: And she... she did. She shook herself out of my grip and went to him after only about a minute.

data.name: She_kept_muttering_about_how_he_was_her_baby_and_she_was_sorry
data.value: She kept muttering about how he was her baby, and she was sorry...

data.name: The_last_thing_I_remember_is_her_screaming_while_he_swung_the_wrench_at_my_head
data.value: The last thing I remember is her screaming while he swung the wrench at my head.

data.name: And_thats_it_It_was_both_of_them_working_together
data.value: And that's it? It was both of them, working together?

data.name: My_wife_My_son
data.value: My wife... My son...

data.name: My_own_family_And_all_this_time_I_thought_maybe_they_were_hurt_But_theyd_just_run_away
data.value: My own family... And all this time, I thought maybe they were hurt... But they'd just run away.
